Pointless API Docs

pointless/prelude/function.ptls (source)

compose(a, b) link 
compose(a, b) = x => b(a(x))
id(a) link 
id(a) = a
const(a, b) link 
const(a, b) = a

example: length(list) = list |> map(const(1)) |> sum
iterate(func, init) link 
Get an infinte list [init, func(init), func(func(init)) ...]
